thread.title: Miss Universe 2017 - Hosts, Judges, Performers, & More Info!
thread.title_full: Miss Universe 2017 - Hosts, Judges, Performers, & More Info!

author: Just Jared
title: Miss Universe 2017 - Hosts, Judges, Performers, & More Info!
text:
The 2017 Miss Universe competition is happening tonight and we have all of the info that you need to know about the hosts, judges, and performers.
The show is kicking off at 7pm on Fox and it will last for three hours.
Steve Harvey is returning as the host and he will be joined by Ashley Graham . Hopefully he won’t announce the wrong winner like he did back in December 2015!
There will be six judges and two performers during the show.
Click through the slideshow for info on the hosts, judges, and performers…
